name: The Restless Island
description:
You are stuck on an island constantly swept by meteorological disasters. You must repair and upgrade your house in order to survive each wave, before you run out time.

____

Use WASD to move around the island

Space bar to jump
Left click to gather resources or to repair/upgrade your house
Right click around the crafting table to change the current craft

And make sure to be at home when the cataclysm hit!

___

Jeremy Lebrun as développer
Matthieu Limozin as 2d artist
Clément Cunuder as 3d artist
